Docs.param: Optional. Maximum length of the text returned. Defaults to 1000 tokens.
Optional. Separator used between lines. Defaults to '\n'.
Docs.summary: Returns the current conversation history as a string of text.
Docs.returns: The most recent lines of conversation history as a text string.
Docs.remarks: The length of the returned text is gated by and only whole lines of history entries will be returned. That means that if the length of the most recent history entry is greater then , no text will be returned.
